article_title: Dr. Donald Berwick falls short in Massachusetts gubernatorial bid - Modern Healthcare Vital Signs

article_metadata.description: Former CMS Administrator Dr. Donald Berwick, the noted healthcare quality guru and vocal advocate of a single-payer health insurance system, will not be the next governor of Massachusetts. Berwick finished third in Tuesday's Democratic primary, which was won by Massachusetts Attorney General Martha Coakley.Berwick, 68, who founded the Institute for Healthcare Improvement, drew support from 21% of primary voters, compared to 42% for Coakley and 36% for state Treasurer Steve Grossman.
article_metadata.title: Dr. Donald Berwick falls short in Massachusetts gubernatorial bid
